resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/77684</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>77684</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>SDT</catalog>
            <entry>40b2660e-57c8-45f3-23bc-7a0063046190#1#3</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="hu">Giotto: A Badia-oltár, 1301-2, Galleria degli Uffizi, Firenze, 91x340 cm, tempera, tábla</string>
            <string language="en">Giotto: The Badia Polyptych, 1301-2, Galleria degli Uffizi, Florence, 91x340 cm, tempera, plate.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Giotto: Das Badia Polyptych, 1301-2, 
Galleria degli Uffizi, Florenz, 91x340 Zentimeter, tempera, Platte.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Giotto : Le Badia Polyptych, 1301-2, degli 
Uffizi, Florence, 91x340 centimètre, tempera, plat de Galleria.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Giotto: O Badia Polyptych, 1301-2, degli 
Uffizi de Galleria, Florença, 91x340 cm, tempera, placa.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Giotto: Il Badia Polyptych, 1301-2, degli 
Uffizi, Firenze, 91x340 centimetro, tempera, piastra di Galleria.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Giotto: Το Badia Polyptych, 1301-2, 
Galleria degli Uffizi, Φλωρεντία, 91x340 εκατ., 
tempera, πιάτο.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Giotto: El Badia Polyptych, 1301-2, degli 
Uffizi, Florencia, 91x340 centímetro, tempera, placa de Galleria.</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">Giotto a nápolyi udvarban mint protopictor és mint protomagister dolgozott. Az udvari megrendelések mellet számos egyéb megrendelést is elvégzett, aminek példája ez az oltárkép.</string>
            <string language="en">Giotto worked as protopictor and protomagister in the Court of Naples. He executed a many of other orderings besides the Court’s as this polyptych proves it.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu">udvari művész,  oltárkép,  ,  Giotto,  Badia-oltár,  </string>
            <string language="en">court-artist, polyptych, Giotto, Badia Polyptych</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Giotto bearbeitet als protopictor und protomagister im 
Gericht von Neapel. Er führte viele anderer orderings außer 
dem Court?s durch, wie dieses polyptych es prüft.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Giotto travaillé comme protopictor et protomagister dans 
la cour de Naples. Il a exécuté des plusieurs d'autres 
orderings sans compter que le Court?s comme ce polyptych le prouve.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Giotto trabalhado como o protopictor e o protomagister na 
corte de Nápoles. Executou uns muitos de outros orderings além
do Court?s como este polyptych o prova.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Giotto funzionato come il protopictor e protomagister 
nella corte di Napoli. Ha eseguito i molti di altri orderings 
oltre al Court?s come questo polyptych lo dimostra.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Το Giotto ελειτούργησε ως protopictor και 
protomagister στο δικαστήριο της Νάπολης. Εκτέλεσε πολλές
από άλλες διαταγές εκτός από το Court?s ως αυτό το 
polyptych το αποδεικνύει.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Giotto trabajado como protopictor y protomagister en la 
corte de Nápoles. Él ejecutó muchos de otros orderings 
además del Court?s como este polyptych lo prueba.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Gericht-Künstler, polyptych, Giotto, Badia Polyptych</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">cour-artiste, polyptych, Giotto, Badia Polyptych</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">corte-artista, polyptych, Giotto, Badia Polyptych</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">corte-artista, polyptych, Giotto, Badia Polyptych</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">δικαστήριο-καλλιτέχνης, polyptych, Giotto, Badia 
Polyptych</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">corte-artista, polyptych, Giotto, Badia Polyptych</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <educational>
          <learningResourceType>
            <source>LRE.learningResourceTypeValues</source>
            <value>image</value>
          </learningResourceType>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <cost>
            <source>costValues</source>
            <value>no</value>
          </cost>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">A tartalom kizárólag kizárólag az oktatás illetve tudományos kutatás céljára használható szigorúan non-profit jelleggel.</string>
            <string language="en">The content may be used for the sole purpose of illustration for teaching or scientific research and only for a strictly non-commercial purpose.</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
        <lifeCycle>

              <value>publisher</value>
            </role>
            <entity>begin:vcard 
version:3.0
n:;
fn: 
org:Nemzeti Tankönyvkiadó Rt.
end:vcard</entity>
          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>
        <classification>
          <purpose>
            <source>purposeValues</source>
            <value>discipline</value>
          </purpose>
          <taxonPath>
            <source>
              <string language="x-none">LRE-0001</string>
            </source>
            <taxon>
              <id>591</id>
            </taxon>
          </taxonPath>
        </classification>
        <metaMetadata>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>LRE.roleMetaValues</source>
              <value>provider</value>
            </role>
            <entity>begin:vcard
        org:Sulinet

        </metaMetadata>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
